attributes.action: all convicted rioters should get the MAXIMUM fine for their actions to pay for damages, not our tax money.
attributes.additional_details: the government may have to foot the bill for damages for riots, as a certain act may make local police forces liable for damages due to rioting. this may cost the tax payer up to £100 million in total for repairs and damages (initial figures quoted in news papers). i'm all for compensation to victims, however, i feel that those responsible should pay the bill. if we can impose the maximum fines for convicted rioters as a mandatory measure, we should be able to at least minimize that bill by a significant amount.
